member.returns: Int 0 execution succeeded, connected=true, others see error list

member.summary: Disconnect
member.returns: Int 0 execution succeeded, connected=false, others see error list

member.summary: Start command

member.summary: Get the working status of the device; true=working, false=stop

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.Stop
member.summary: Stop command

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.Reset
member.summary: Conveyor turntable reset zero return command

member.summary: PLC hanging point data clear command
member.returns: int 0 execution succeed,connected=true，Other see error list

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetBasePoint
member.summary: Get the origin number

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetResetState
member.summary: Get the device reset state; true = reset complete, false = reset

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetClotheReady
member.summary: Get clothes ready state This command can only be applied to controller number 1 (strip controller) If the clothes are ready, you can turn on the RFID read or send the next command.

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.Sorting(System.Int32)
member.summary: Control the direction of the clothes,, LineNum=1or2 This command can only be applied to controller number 1 (strip controller)

member.summary: GetWaitHangNum()

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.ResetWaitHangNum
member.summary: ResetWaitHangNum()

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetClotheinhook
member.summary: Put clothes into the clothes test, indicating that clothes have entered the hanging hook the true has clothes and false has No clothes.

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.Packclothes
member.summary: Pack clothes This command can only be applied to controller number 1 (strip controller)

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetModel
member.summary: Get the hanging operation mode, false is the upper machine control, true is the automatic control mode
member.returns: false为上位机控制,true为自动控制

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.SetModel(System.Int32)
member.summary: 设置挂衣工作模式

member.summary: Hang clothing into the specified slot number

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.SetNowPoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the current hanging point number, which must be executed in working mode 0；

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetNowPoint
member.summary: Get the current slot number

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GotoPoint
member.summary: Go to the specified clothing point, first set the target position by executing SetNowPoint()；

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.Hang_In
member.summary: Hanging in the clothes, first execute GotoPoint to go to the specified point and execute；

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.Hang_In_State
member.summary: hang in state, 0 in Executing, 1 in Finished;

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.DialState
member.summary: Turntable status, 1 when going, stop 0

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.TakeOutClothes(System.String)
member.summary: Take out clothes

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetTakeoutStartdelay
member.summary: Get the clothes extractor open delay

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.SetTakeoutStartdelay(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the clothes extractor open delay, usually this number is very small 0-5 When taking the clothes, adjust the parameter when the take-up device advances or delays the action until the clothes cannot be taken out.

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetTakeoutStopdelay
member.summary: 获取衣物取出器关闭延时，通常这个数字很小0-5

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.SetTakeoutStopdelay(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the clothes extractor off delay, usually this number is very small 0-5 When taking the clothes, adjust the parameter when the take-up device advances or delays the action until the clothes cannot be taken out.

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetTakeOutClothesState
member.summary: Working state of the clothes taking device

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetMaxPoint
member.summary: Get the maximum number of slots set

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.SetMaxPoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the maximum number of slots

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetHanginpoint
member.summary: Get the position of the hanging point (the distance from the origin) is generally set by default, no need to change

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.SetHanginpoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the position of the hanging point (distance from the origin) is generally set by default, no need to change
member.param: Number of points from the origin

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.SetTakeOutClothesPoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the position of the clothes extractor (distance from the origin)
member.param: Number of points from the origin

member.name: M:PlcControl.FinsTcp.GetTakeOutClothesPoint
member.summary: Get the position of the clothes extractor (distance from the origin)
member.returns: int Number of points from the origin
